title: Four simple ways to change your hair in under 30 minutes
text:
'Tweakment' has been the beauty buzz word that gained even more momentum this year. Referring to subtle or barely noticeable procedures, it can be applied to any treatment whether it be cosmetic, health-related or even as simple as your daily hair or make-up regime. 2019 has continued with a less is more approach to beauty - and habits now suggest that before you consider going under the knife (or the scissors of a hairdresser in this case), there are many beauty tweakments you can make that are super subtle but equally impactful.

In a recent conversation with hair maverick Guido Palau, he highlighted to me the power of 'tweaking' your hair to switch things up, saving you the stressful decision...
description: 'Tweakment' has been the beauty buzz word that gained even more momentum this year.
